title: Chitwanix OS 1.0 Kaade Vyakur ( Spiny Babbler)
description:
CHitwanix OS 1.0 Kaade Vyakur (Spiny Babbler) was released in 21st September 2013
Chitwanix OS, developed using linux kernal and is customized OS of Linux Mint which Chitwanix OSis derived from Ubuntu.The full name of OS is Ã¢â‚¬Å“ Chitwanix OS 1.0 -Kaade Vyakur Ã¢â‚¬Å“. The name of the OS is named after one of the district of Nepal named Chitwan to Chitwanix OS and its tagline kaade vyakur (or Spiny babbler) is the name of the bird found in Nepal only.The OS is customized by Nepali developers.The OS is fully focused to Nepali Users taste and requirements, seeking their day to day computing habits. Chitwanix OS was official released on Software Freedom Day 2013 (SFD 2013) from Chitwan and Kathmandu, Nepal.
